Orico XD007-BK-BP External CD Driver

Orico XD007-BK-BP External CD Driver is DVD-RW (USB3.0) CD Type. It is made with ABS Plastic Material. This CD Driver is featured with CD-ROM Read:24X/DVD-ROM Read:8X Speed and CD-R:24X, CD-RW:16X, DVD-R:8X, DVD-RW:16X Burn Speed. This Orico External CD Driver has a 2MB Capacity. It Supports Ultra DMA 5 PIO Transfer Mode 4, Buffer underrun free. This CD Drive also has 5 DVD Partition. full_description:
Transcend TS8XDVDS-K Slim External Black DVD Writer

Transcend TS8XDVDS-K Slim External Black DVD Writer is used for thin-and-light laptops, netbooks, and Ultrabooks. This DVD Writer includes a free download of CyberLink Media Suite 10 media writing software suite. It is built with Ultra-slim, sleek design with rounded edges â€“ just 13.9mm thick. This DVD Writer is compatible with CD-R/RW, DVDÂ±R, DVDÂ±RW, DVDÂ±R DL, M-DISC, DVD-RAM media and supports TV connectivity for media playback without additional driver installation. Reads and writes Dual Layer discs ar added in this DVD writer, where Read and Write speed for DVD is 8x and Read and Write speed for CD is 24x. It also has 160ms/140ms DVD/CD ROM, max. 142.8 mm x 148.0 mm x 13.9 mm (5.62" x 5.83" x 0.55") dimension, mini USB to USB Type A interface with including CyberLink Power2Go media writing software and no external power adapter needed because USB powered already added here. This DVD Writer supports Microsoft Windows 7, Microsoft Windows 8, Microsoft Windows 10, Mac OS X 10.7 or later, Vista and XP. Here is noted that TV connectivity function does not support DVD Movie Title playback and file size over 4GB. Normal operation is not guaranteed if you use a USB hub or unspecified USB extension cables and also due to compatibility issues, the TV connectivity function may not work with some AV devices and discs. This slim External DVD Writer provides 01 year of warranty.

full_description:
ORICO XD008 External DVD Writer with Hub

The ORICO XD008 has a CD-ROM Read speed up to 24X and DVD-ROM Read speed up to 8X. It offers rewrite speed of CD-R 24X; CD-RW 16X; DVD-R 8X; DVD-RW 6X. It supports Error Correction Function. It comes with 2MB RAM. It features Ultra DMA 5, PIO mode 4 transmission mode. It supports the expansion of SD/TF cards. It has 2 USB 3.0 ports that support HUB expansion and a portable hard drive. It has an A+C TO Micro-B 2-in-1 cable(A to Micro-B/C to Micro-B) which can provide stable power and data transfer. The ORICO XD008 comes with a 1-year warranty.

title: ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U External DVD Drive Gold
cat_seo_title: External Optical Disk Drive Prices in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Discover a wide range of External Optical Disk Drive including ASUS, Dell, Liteon brands at best price in BD. Shop online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U External DVD Drive Gold

The ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U is an ultraslim external DVD drive & writer with USB Type-C and Type-A interface to support a variety of laptops including PC and Mac. The reversible Type-C for any-way-up connectivity convenience enables ultra-fast data transmission from compatible devices. It has a robust construction with a Zen-inspired concentric-circle finish. With the USB-C, ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U External DVD Drive is ready to plug right in. It supports M-DISC, an archival-quality storage solution designed to help users protect their most precious digital memories. M-DISC burning technology engraves recorded data into a patented rock-like layer that is resistant to extreme conditions. It features hassle-free data protection through password control and hidden folder functions (Windows OS). The ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U offers cross-platform support and it is compatible with Windows and Mac OS. It comes with a 1-year warranty.

values.value: CPU: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon 2100+ or higher

product_list_short_description: DVD Read and Write Speeds: up to 8x
CD Read and Write Speeds: up to 24x

cat_seo_description: Discover a wide range of External Optical Disk Drive including ASUS, Dell, Liteon brands at best price in BD. Shop online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
product_page_short_description: DVD Read and Write Speeds: up to 8x
CD Read and Write Speeds: up to 24x
full_description:
ASUS ZenDrive V1M External DVD Writer

The ASUS ZenDrive V1M External DVD Drive and Writer with M-Disc Support is a 14.6mm external optical drive with a USB Type-C interface that is compatible with Windows and Mac. This drive has an 8x maximum DVD read and write speed and a 24x maximum CD read and write speed. This drive also supports M-DISC, an archival-quality storage solution designed to assist users in protecting their data. M-DISC technology engraves recorded data into a specific layer that is resistant to extreme temperatures. M-DISC is intended to protect your data from degradation and loss for at least 1,000 years. This optical drive comes with Cyberlink and Nero software.

Cut-Crystal Style and Storage

The ASUS ZenDrive V1M's sleek, contemporary design conceals a ton of functionality and convenience. You won't ever have to worry about forgetting or losing the 24 cm connecting cable because it is both contained and hidden by a corner cover.

M-DISC Support

ASUS ZenDrive V1M supports M-DISC, an archival-quality storage solution for safeguarding your valuable digital memories ranging from family photos to home videos and more. M-DISC-burning technology engraves recorded data into a patented rock-like layer that is resistant to extreme temperatures, allowing you to save your life's memories and critical data for up to 1,000 years.

Buy ASUS ZenDrive V1M External DVD Writer from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original ASUS ZenDrive V1M External DVD Writer From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest ASUS DVD Writer to purchase for your Desktop PC. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The ASUS ZenDrive V1M External DVD Writer comes with 1 year warranty.
